thread.title: An Artist Repainted Emma Watson's Belle Doll And OMG It Looks Amazing
thread.title_full: An Artist Repainted Emma Watson's Belle Doll And OMG It Looks Amazing

author: Crystal Ro
title: An Artist Repainted Emma Watson's Belle Doll And OMG It Looks Amazing
text:
View this image ›
Laurie Sparham / Via Disney Like, there’s absolutely, no doubt whatsoever.
ID: 10407496 2. But, TBH, fans were a little less excited about seeing the live action Belle doll, because well… View this image ›
Disney / Via ebay.com In fact, a lot of people really think this doll looks less like Emma Watson and more like Justin Bieber . ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
ID: 10407267 3. But before you go crying into the lap of a magical wardrobe, check out this MIND-BLOWING custom repaint by talented artist Noel Cruz : Facebook: video.php ::Picks jaw up off floor.::
ID: 10407333 4. No, this is not the wizardry of Photoshop or CGI. This is simply paint. JUST PAINT, did you hear me?!?! View this image ›
Noel Cruz / Via Facebook: noelcruz.art And, YES, a l t of talent, too.
ID: 10407339 5. Like, HOW EVEN?! View this image ›
Noel Cruz / Facebook: noelcruz.art / Disney Eerie, and I love it.
ID: 10407352 6. Cruz says he plans on finding a more “suitable” body after he’s done with the repaint. Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @noelcruzdolls Many of his fans had actually commented about it.
ID: 10407478 7. And he also plans to make the completed doll available on eBay soon. Facebook: video.php So, tie your napkin ‘round your neck, cherie and GET THOSE DOLLARS READY!
ID: 10407649 8. To see more of Cruz’s beautiful artwork, check out his site here ! ID: 10407677
 More News About Emma Watson
